ai-patthana8.63:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.63:1.1_0: ... those who don’t give rise to joy in those without rapture ...
ai-patthana8.63:2.1_0: Neither pervading non-offensesiveness arises dependent on rapture.
ai-patthana8.63:3.1_0: Neither pervasions nor happiness arises dependent on the rapture. ...
ai-patthana8.63:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
